content.question: Objects <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> are constrained to move along a straight line. The graphs above show the net force exerted along that line on each of the objects as functions of time. Which of the following correctly ranks the change in momentum <math alttext="delta p" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the objects?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta p sub X is less than delta p sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta p sub X equals delta p sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta p sub X is greater than delta p sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
The ranking cannot be determined without knowing the masses of the objects.

content.answer: <math alttext="delta p sub X equals delta p sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
